body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lydia A. Hinton. Father of Aris D. Hinton, Ana Hinton, Rosanna Hinton, William Hinton, and Daniel B. Hinton. Carpenter in Fleming County in 1850. Farmer in Fleming County in 1860.
